data.message:
I have a request about this application for becoming better & complete! , in first congratulations for adding Tag option, secondly it will be better and best when you add a text editing option, also download or copieng a piture, it helps those phones which aren't touch screen!

Plz renew a complete and best fb app!!! Tnx alot
